cast.name: 莎拉·斯图尔特 Sara Stewart
爱德华·麦克利亚姆 Edward MacLiam

introduction: SynopsisSUGAR RUSH SERIES 2 delves into the life of teenage lesbian Kim and her intense lust for the beautiful Maria Sweet--otherwise known as Sugar--and sees the introduction of sex-shop manager Saint, who also attracts the attention of Kim. In addition to the distractions provided by Sugar and Saint, Kim has to deal with her dysfunctional family. She has an obsessively house-proud father, an extremely unusual brother and a mother who acts like an adolescent. SUGAR RUSH details Kim teenage years growing up in Brighton and focuses on her loves and all the excitement and complications that result from it. Each episode sheds further light on Kim's world and her emotions with the use of her wry observations on life and love.
